ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: nor do you urge the feeding of the poor;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and do not urge one another to feed the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or urge one another to feed the destitute?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And do not urge one another to feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And urge not one another on the feeding of the Miskin!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and you urge not the feeding of the needy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And urge not on the feeding of the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor urge upon each other the feeding of the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and do not urge the feeding of the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And urge not on the feeding of AlMiskin (the poor)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: nor do you urge one another to feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you do not urge the feeding of the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:18] and they do not urge, neither themselves nor others, the feeding of the needy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And urge not) yourselves or others (on the feeding of the poor) giving alms to the poor,
